cards.name: Abandon Ship
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor: Black waters bring dark fates.
cards.name: Abyss Surger
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Abyss Surger enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “What kinds of fish swim these waters? Breakfast, lunch, and dinner.”
cards.name: Adept Fisherman
cards.text:
{T}: Adept Fisherman voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Adept Fisherman phases in, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: It takes a worthy and fearsome man to command the respect of an entire fleet.
cards.name: Admirable Admiral
cards.text: Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token with haste.

cards.name: Adoroth, the Baneful
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Adoroth, the Baneful attacks, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
{1}{R}{R}: Adoroth, the Baneful deals 4 damage to any target. Activate only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.name: Aerie Watch
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Aerie Watch enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach.

cards.flavor: The treasure of Giradrus is guarded by an elite force of soldiers risen from those who hitherto came for it.
cards.name: Afflicted Legion
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature.

cards.flavor: She took to the seas seeking gold, so that she might one day buy passage on a much greater ship to seek much more gold.
cards.name: All That Glitters
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

cards.flavor: The mutineers fought with reckless abandon. They could recruit a new crew, but there would never be another Shadowstaff.
cards.name: All for One
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.
Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Alvarez of the Huntsman
cards.text:
First mate—At least half the cards in your starting deck are lands. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Trample
{1}, Discard a land card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Alvarez. He deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor:
“On the three seas, each day can be a mission, or an adventure, or a vacation! A pirate's life is what you make it. Make it the best you can.”
—First mate Harriet of the Pioneer
cards.name: Another Day in Paradise

rulings.text: se the `$shuffle 10` command to randomize additional libraries.

cards.text: Search your library for up to ten land cards, reveal them, and shuffle them into a new face-down library.

cards.flavor: Any scoundrel who boards the Demeter must accept that their life now holds the value of a single gold piece.
cards.name: Arbiter of the Demeter
cards.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. You gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
“Follow that drake. We can't be the only ones trying to escape this storm.”
—Atworth Wingate
cards.name: Armada Envoy
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control phases in, it gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Projectile weapons, though flashy, fared poorly against the tried-and-true steel plates worn in the Wards.
cards.name: Armored Valiant
cards.text: When Armored Valiant enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “Stopping so soon? There may yet be more treasure. Best keep digging.”
cards.name: Autointerment
cards.text: Exile target tapped creature. Its controller gains 3 life.

cards.flavor: “We are bruised, but far from beaten. Shields up, brothers and sisters.”
cards.name: Battle Rallier
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Black Spot
cards.text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.
You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: “Ready for war? Never. Ready for battle? Always.”
cards.name: Blacksteel Loadout
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +4/+2 and has first strike, vigilance, and trample.
Equip {3}

cards.flavor:
“They said the trees sang, but the first tree I found roared. I didn't stay to find another.”
—First mate Tabia of the Lionheart
cards.name: Blighted Branch-Beast
cards.text:
Trample
{1}{G}: Put an overgrowth counter on target creature you control. As long as it has an overgrowth counter on it, it has base power and toughness 8/8.

cards.name: Blood for Bones
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
Mersey's eyes narrowed as the silhouette of an enemy ship came into view.
“Dawes, accelerate to ramming speed.”
cards.name: Boarding Party
cards.text: Create three 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature tokens with haste.

cards.name: Bramble Armor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Bramble Armor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
{G}, Sacrifice Bramble Armor: Enchanted creature gains indestructible end of turn. Tap it.

cards.name: Breakneck Barque
cards.text:
Whenever Breakneck Barque becomes blocked by a creature, Breakneck Barque deals 3 damage to that creature.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: Pirates escaping sunken ships have two choices—improvise, or drown.
cards.name: Bridled Narwhal
cards.text: When Bridled Narwhal enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

cards.name: Brig of the Damned
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Brig of the Damned enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card's mana value is 2, you may return it to the battlefield instead.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: “Come on, lads! Let's jump ship!”
cards.name: Broadside Raider
cards.text: When Broadside Raider enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token with haste.

cards.flavor: Brume leviathans rise with the waves, crashing down on hapless ships as the surf breaks.
cards.name: Brume Leviathan
cards.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

cards.flavor:
“Imagine the greatest tree you've ever seen falling directly onto you. It's like that, but with more intention.”
—Captain Darlene Filham
cards.name: Bushwhack
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Calamitous Wave
cards.text: Return up to two target creatures and/or artifacts to their owners' hands. For each permanent returned to its owner's hand this way, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor: The best cannoneers in the three seas can knock a helmsman clean off the wheel and overboard with a single shot.
cards.name: Cannonblast
cards.text: Cannonblast deals 5 damage to target creature. If you control a Pirate, Cannonblast deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: Helicos tremors serve as caution that the trees have awakened.
cards.name: Canopy Stomper
cards.text:
Vigilance
Resolute — Canopy Stomper can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less as long as Canopy Stomper's power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Captain's Companion
cards.text:
Flying
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more other Pirates you control deal combat damage to a player, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“Deliver these chests to the North Ward, no questions asked. Do not open them.”
—Atworth Wingate
cards.name: Captain's Orders
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control two or more Pirates.
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Captain Darlene Filham
cards.text:
First strike, haste
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
{1}{R}: Darlene gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Darlene deals damage to a player, if the top card of your library has mana value equal to the damage dealt, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor:
“I don't fear the storm. I fear what flies above it.”
—Captain Darlene Filham
cards.name: Cascade Drake
cards.text:
Flash
Flying

cards.flavor: A good pirate will sail under any flag, if the price is right.
cards.name: Chartered Fleet
cards.text: Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Children of Gos
cards.text:
{1}{G}, Discard a card: Target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature. It's still a land. Exile the top card of your library face down.
Whenever a land creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a card exiled with Children of Gos into your hand.

cards.name: Civil Discourse
cards.text:
Target creature attacks or blocks this turn if able.
Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Claustrophobia
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor: “Our sworn enemies for generations, and suddenly they bring a gift of gold? Do you not find it suspicious? Turn them away, or we will surely all suffer.”
cards.name: Cleansing Cleric
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.flavor: Shaledrakes are as smart as majestic, making them highly sought after as symbols of status.
cards.name: Coasting Shaledrake
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Coasting Shaledrake deals combat damage to a player, scry 1.

cards.flavor: Helicos storms bring out the oddest of its already curious fauna.
cards.name: Coralhide Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Coralhide Wurm.

cards.flavor: A single agama bite is enough to fell the tallest of trees—or at least bust open the hull of a ship.
cards.name: Crackling Agama
cards.text: Resolute — Whenever Crackling Agama deals combat damage to a player, if Crackling Agama's power is greater than its base power, that player sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: Ellison Crain is a ruthless lord, and he takes no living prisoners.
cards.name: Crain's Crew
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, Crain's Crew gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Crain's Crony
cards.text:
Whenever Crain's Crony enters the battlefield or attacks, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.
At the beginning of each end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you lose the game.

cards.name: Crazed Swashbuckler
cards.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Crazed Swashbuckler's power is greater than its base power, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. That creature can't block this turn.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Now checks for five different names (from four).
cards.name: Crewmaster Gillo
cards.text:
When Gillo enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand.
As long as you control five or more creatures with different names, creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

cards.name: Crosswind Cutter
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Crosswind Cutter if it's a creature.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Crown of the Speaker
Cruising Schooner
cards.text:
Whenever Cruising Schooner attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: The dead walk to warn of their mistakes, and to hunt those who make them.
cards.name: Crypt Strider
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Crypt Strider enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token for each creature card in your graveyard.

cards.name: Cryptozoologist
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Cryptozoologist voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Cryptozoologist phases in, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield until Cryptozoologist leaves the battlefield. (It returns to your hand if it's still on the battlefield.)

cards.name: Culling Blade
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, they sacrifice two permanents.
Equip—{2}, Sacrifice a creature.

cards.flavor:
“There's always room for a fresh face on board—especially a face as fresh as that.”
—Loretta Wingate
cards.name: Dapper Ragamuffin
cards.text: Whenever Dapper Ragamuffin attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn if you control another attacking Pirate.

cards.flavor: The call of treasure is irresistible, sending many a man in pursuit of glory.
cards.name: Daybreak Wayfarers
cards.text:
{2}{G}{U}: Target creature you control voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever a creature you control phases in, draw a card.

cards.name: Deathless Conscription
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Deathless Conscription enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature.
You control enchanted creature.

cards.flavor: The waters surrounding Helicos are enchanted by dark hexes, summoning monsters from beneath to defend them.
cards.name: Deluge Gorger
cards.text: Creatures you don't control get -1/-0 as long as their controller is cursed.

cards.flavor:
“Amazing, isn't it? A creature the size of a castle, and it hunts with stealth.”
—Atworth Wingate
cards.name: Depth Lurker
cards.text: Flash

cards.flavor: There was nothing left of Carlyle to see but a few tiny bubbles in the ocean surf.
cards.name: Dissolve
cards.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1.

cards.name: Down with the Ship
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
When Down with the Ship enters the battlefield, enchanted player discards a card unless they sacrifice a creature.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Down with the Ship: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Dragonlord's Shrine
cards.text:
Each creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
{T}, Discard a card: Dragonlord's Shrine deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.name: Dreadbearer
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life, discards a card, and sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Dusk Lieutenant
cards.text:
When Dusk Lieutenant enters the battlefield, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Once each turn, when you discard a card during your turn, each opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Dwarven War Hatchet
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike.
Equip {2}{R}
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
When Dwarven War Hatchet enters the battlefield, if you cast it for its madness cost, attach it to target creature you control.

cards.name: Eager Voyager
cards.text:
{4}{G}{G}: Eager Voyager voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Eager Voyager phases in, if it has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: East Ward Champion
cards.text:
Vigilance
Resolute — Whenever East Ward Champion attacks, attacking creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn if East Ward Champion's power is greater than its base power.

cards.flavor: “A ship? Aye, I can build a ship. Get me the wood and I could build a fleet.”
cards.name: East Ward Forgetender
cards.text:
First strike
{1}{R}, Discard a card: East Ward Forgetender gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “A good warrior knows his blade. A great warrior knows the whole weapon.”
cards.name: East Ward Halberdier
cards.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, East Ward Halberdier gains double strike until end of turn if its power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Elaborate Firecannon
cards.text:
Elaborate Firecannon doesn't untap during your untap step.
{4}, {T}: Elaborate Firecannon deals 2 damage to any target.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you do, untap Elaborate Firecannon.

cards.name: Elder Prophesier
cards.text: When Elder Prophesier enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Curse card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Empyrean Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Empyrean Griffin attacks, up to one target creature voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Permanents your opponents control can't phase in.

cards.flavor:
“Consider yourself lucky that instead of being consigned to our eternal fate you will simply . . . cease to exist.”
—Lord Ellison Crain
cards.name: Essence Scatter
cards.text: Counter target creature spell.

cards.name: Exotic Discovery
cards.text:
Madness {4}{G}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Look at the top eight cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then if this spell was cast for its madness cost, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Expunge the Terrors
cards.text:
Expunge the Terrors deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Madness—{1}{R}, Exile X cards from your graveyard. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: “You stand accused of arson, petty theft, grand theft, larceny, murder, forgery, and seventy-two counts of piracy. How do you plead?”
cards.name: Fair Trial
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker with mana value 4 or less.

cards.flavor: “They call it cowardice. I say savvy.”
cards.name: Faithless Deserter
cards.text: When Faithless Deserter enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Fated Mariner
cards.text:
Whenever Fated Mariner attacks, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
{1}{U}: Fated Mariner can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: One to lure, one to kill. Both to feast.
cards.name: Fen Glutton
cards.text:
Menace
As long as you control exactly one other creature, that creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.

cards.flavor:
“Ships and monsters are really one in the same—put enough holes in them, and they sink.”
—Captain Raj of the Huntsman
cards.name: Fiery Cannonade
cards.text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

cards.name: Fiery Temper
cards.text:
Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: Nothing inspires an army quite like a hero's anthem.
cards.name: Fight Song
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Welcome to the end of humanity. Welcome . . . to perfection.”
—Lord Ellison Crain
cards.name: Find Greater Purpose
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

cards.name: First General of the Wards
cards.text:
Vigilance
Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a permanent, create two 1/1 white Dwarf creature tokens.

cards.flavor: One way or another, it turns the tide of battle.
cards.name: Flaming Point Technique
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
• Destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Flintlock Pistol

cards.flavor: All hands readied on deck. Their priority was now keeping the Peregrine afloat.
cards.name: Fog at Sea
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.flavor: Giradrus took pause at the anvil of an unfazed dwarven smith. He may yet have a use for these tiny creatures.
cards.name: Forged Alliance
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 until end of turn. Put a first strike counter on each of them.

cards.name: Forsaken Shores
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they lose 1 life and each of their opponents gains 1 life.
{4}{B}, Sacrifice Forsaken Shores: Enchanted player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: When sailing through griffin territory, always bring gold to spare.
cards.name: Gale Mediator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell, if it isn't that player's main phase, each of their opponents may draw a card.

cards.name: Garth of the Chimera
cards.text:
First mate—Your starting deck contains no creature cards. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Prowess
Whenever Garth attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it. (You still pay its costs.)

cards.name: Gaze of the Grave
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Enchanted player plays with the top card of their library revealed.
Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, you may have them mill a card.

cards.flavor: It exudes toxic vapors from its body in lieu of a tangible stinger.
cards.name: Ghastly Scorpion
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Ghastly Scorpion dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Ghost Sloop
cards.text:
Ghost Sloop can't be blocked.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Ghost Sloop becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Giradrus, Ashen Master
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Giradrus enters the battlefield or attacks, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a Dragon card from among them onto the battlefield. If Giradrus is attacking, that Dragon enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: Spirits of Helicos lure foolish men deep into the forest, never to return.
cards.name: Glisterhorn
cards.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Glisterhorn's power is greater than its base power, tap target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor:
“Hush, little baby. Don't you cry.”
—Lord Ellison Crain
cards.name: Good Night's Sleep
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Gos, Knotweald Elder

rulings.text: Effectively, your creatures's power is the greater of their power and toughness, and your opponents creatures's toughness is the smaller of their power and toughness.
This effect applies in a new layer, after PT switching.

cards.text:
Vigilance, trample
Each creature you control can't have power less than its toughness. (If it would have less, it has as much as its toughness instead.)
Each creature your opponents control can't have toughness greater than its power.

cards.flavor: The plague of an elder dragon afflicts all who dare to breathe.
cards.name: Grasp of Hollows
cards.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 5/5 black Horror.

cards.flavor: Giradrus's plague creates vessels that raise armies.
cards.name: Grave Wrangler
cards.text: When Grave Wrangler enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Greedy Rapscallions
cards.text: When Greedy Rapscallions enters the battlefield, mill three cards. If two or more nonland cards were put into your graveyard this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Greedy Rapscallions.

cards.name: Grievous Buccaneer
cards.text:
When Grievous Buccaneer enters the battlefield, it voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Grievous Buccaneer phases in, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: Dwarves in the North Ward nurture griffins from tiny chicks to great allies.
cards.name: Griffling
cards.text: Flying, lifelink

cards.flavor:
“Under my plague, many men will die. Then the dead will rise, and all will fall.”
—Dragonlord Giradrus
cards.name: Grisly Reaper
cards.text: When Grisly Reaper enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.

cards.flavor: No one has seen the horrors he's seen. Not even him.
cards.name: Grizzled Cutthroat
cards.text: Resolute — {T}: Grizzled Cutthroat deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only if Grizzled Cutthroat's power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: H.S.S. Demeter
cards.text:
Whenever H.S.S. Demeter becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature.
Whenever H.S.S. Demeter deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Harbinger of Giradrus
cards.text:
{U}, Give yourself a lore counter: Scry 1. This ability costs {2} more to activate for each lore counter you have.
{6}{U}, Remove three lore counters from yourself, Sacrifice Harbinger of Giradrus: Draw seven cards, then create two 4/4 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Harriet of the Pioneer
cards.text:
First mate—Your starting deck contains at least twelve Vehicles. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Haste
{R}{W}, {T}: You may put a Vehicle card from your hand onto the battlefield. That Vehicle gains haste and becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “Don't ask me where I got it. Ask yourself how much it's worth to you.”
cards.name: Heinous Smuggler
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell with two or more black mana symbols in its mana cost, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: When the Sea Dogs looted Giradrus's cursed gold, the abnormal became normal.
cards.name: Helicos Aberration
cards.text: When Helicos Aberration enters the battlefield, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Helicos Gargantua
cards.text:
Trample
Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Helicos Gargantua's power is greater than its base power, double its power until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Octopi in the Helicos seas inhabit the plentiful shipwrecks that litter the area.
cards.name: Helicos Octopus
cards.text: When Helicos Octopus enters the battlefield, scry 1. If an opponent is cursed, scry 3 instead.

cards.name: Helmsman's Chart
cards.text:
When Helmsman's Chart enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{T}: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types.

cards.name: High Sovereign Thura

rulings.text: Effectively, this makes all trigger conditions that are exactly "When ~ enters the battlefield" into "Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn". Conditions such as "Whenever ~ enters the battlefield or attacks" or "Whenever ~ or another creature enter the battlefield" will not be affected.

cards.text:
Lifelink
Triggered abilities of creatures you control that would trigger only when that creature enters the battlefield instead trigger whenever you gain life for the first time each turn.

cards.name: Holcomb of the Peregrine
cards.text:
First mate—Each nonland card in your starting deck has the same name as exactly one other card in your starting deck. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Vigilance
Whenever you cast a spell with the same name as a card in your graveyard, draw a card.

cards.name: Hugo of the Shadowstaff
cards.text:
First mate—Your starting deck contains only cards with mana value 0, 1, or 3. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Menace
Once each turn, when one or more sources you control deal damage, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hugo.

cards.flavor: The Isle of Helicos is a place of danger, mystery, and utter majesty.
cards.name: Idyllic Pegasus
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, lifelink
Idyllic Pegasus gets +1/+0 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

cards.name: Imperious Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Inexorable Epidemic
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Creatures enchanted player controls get -2/-2.
Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, they lose 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Infernal Fury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: For the first time in eras, the Wards joined forces against a common enemy.
cards.name: Inspired Charge
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Intrepid Captain
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token with haste. That token attacks this combat if able.
Whenever Intrepid Captain attacks, other attacking Pirates you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: His armor has been passed down for eras, and it carries the strength and courage of all who wore it before him.
cards.name: Ironclad Infantry
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ironclad Infantry.

cards.name: Isles Uncharted

rulings.text: You shuffle your library, not your opponent, so ’Whenever an opponent shuffles their library’ effects won’t occur.

cards.text:
Take an extra turn after this one. At any time during that turn, you may search your opponents' libraries for a card and exile it, then shuffle that player's library. You may cast that card from exile, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it. If you don't, shuffle that card into its owner's library.
Exile Isles Uncharted.

cards.flavor:
“Legend tells of a vessel that's half-kraken, half-ship. Well, let's hope it stays a legend.”
—First mate Mable of the Sea's Whimsy
cards.name: Keelhaul
cards.text: Target Vehicle creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Keen Seafarer
cards.text:
{1}{G}: Keen Seafarer voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Keen Seafarer phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Kelp Garden
cards.text:
Enchant land you control
When Kelp Garden enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, add one mana of any color among cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Knotweald Ambassador
cards.text:
Whenever Knotweald Ambassador becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, choose one —
• Knotweald Ambassador deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker that player controls.
• Draw a card.

cards.name: Knotweald Luminary
cards.text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.
{5}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Careful living with your head in the clouds. You may never get your feet on the ground.”
—Captain Darlene Filham
cards.name: Knotweald Ranger
cards.text:
Reach
Knotweald Ranger can't block creatures without flying.

cards.flavor:
“A week ago we were lost at sea, counting our hours. Today we danced with the trees. Atworth, I may never want to leave here.”
—Loretta Wingate
cards.name: Knotweald Sapling
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} or one mana of any color among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “We treefolk are an elder race. We have seen countless of your kind, and we treat you all cordially. Keep the peace, and we might just grow to be comrades.”
cards.name: Knotweald Vanguard
cards.text:
Vigilance
As long as it's your turn, other creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Land Ho!
cards.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard, then discard a card if two cards were put into your hand this way.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Now untaps Omens instead of artifacts.
cards.name: Last Passage
cards.text: Forebode three times, then untap each Omen you control. Until end of turn, if you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. (Create three tapped colorless Omen artifact tokens with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“May I take notes? I'm starting to think our scary stories back home are quite tame.”
—First mate Tabia of the Lionheart
cards.name: Lava Scutterer
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, Lava Scutterer deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: “Let's see. Murder, organized crime, perjury . . . ah, here we go. Piracy.”
cards.name: Law Enforcement
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

cards.name: Legion of Giradrus
cards.text:
{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Skeleton you control.

changes: 2022-11-01 — Now repeats a process instead of copying itself.
cards.flavor: Horg hated the decision he had to make, but homeless was better than dead.
cards.name: Light the Fuse
cards.text: Light the Fuse deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Whenever a permanent dealt damage by Light the Fuse this turn dies this turn, repeat that process.

cards.name: Ligneous Enormity
cards.text:
You may have Ligneous Enormity assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
Madness {3}{G}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: And what a dream it was.
cards.name: Lofty Dreamship
cards.text:
Flying
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Long Forgotten
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard. If two cards that share a type are exiled this way, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Lord Ellison Crain
cards.text:
You control each opponent during your turn.
[+2]: Draw two cards. Each opponent discards two cards.
[-2]: Target player sacrifices a creature.
[-8]: Create thirteen tapped 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens. Take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Lost Knowledge
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
When Lost Knowledge enters the battlefield, enchanted player reveals their hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Lost Knowledge: Scry 2, then draw a card.

cards.name: Mable of the Sea's Whimsy
cards.text:
First mate—Each nonland card in your starting deck is an instant or has flash. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Flash
When Mable enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

cards.flavor: The plague ends when humanity does.
cards.name: Malignant Rise
cards.text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
You draw two cards, and you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Marisa of the Gravehowl

rulings.text: Marisa's first mate ability looks for cards using the game terms 'destroy', 'die', 'graveyard', and 'mill', not that exact arrangement of letters. This means Marisa can be the first mate of a deck running Hushbringer (which says "Creatures entering the battlefield or dying don't cause abilities to trigger."), but not Bloodied Ghost (which says "Bloodied Ghost enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it."

cards.text:
First mate—Each nonland card in your starting deck has “destroy,” “die,” “graveyard,” and/or “mill” in its printed rules text. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Deathtouch
When Marisa enters the battlefield, if it was cast, you may put target permanent card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: Even pirate crews hire someone to do their dirty work.
cards.name: Maritime Thug
cards.text: Whenever Maritime Thug becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

cards.flavor: The cursed gold of Giradrus acts as a beacon to the richest ship in the three seas.
cards.name: Mark of Dark Opulence
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever enchanted player searches their library, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: “I grew up wanting what every little girl wanted—to be a captain. And ain't no man gonna stand in my way.”
cards.name: Mark of Mutiny
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Parton sighed as his boat ran aground, nothing but sand and rocks in sight. He'd be better off dead.
cards.name: Maroon
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Exile target creature.

cards.name: Master Negotiator

rulings.text: If there is no legal target for the etb ability, the ability won't go on the stack and you won't draw a card. Similarly if the target becomes illegal, the ability will be countered and you will not draw a card.

cards.text: When Master Negotiator enters the battlefield, you may gain control of target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less. If you do, its controller may draw a card. Otherwise, you draw a card.

cards.flavor: The rhyllia flower is infamous in Shiryen for its ability to make a man go mad.
cards.name: Mephitic Fumes
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, that creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn unless that player pays 2 life.

cards.flavor: The only dwarves who sail are traders whose lives depend on it.
cards.name: Merchant Galleon
cards.text: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: “We're here to take what we're owed. Boys, let's get ours!”
cards.name: Merciless Bandit
cards.text: Whenever Merciless Bandit or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
“You stranded me with nothing but the clothes on my back and a gun holding one shot. I've run my sword through thirty-six good men so I could use this shot on you.”
—Jacques, the Crow of Death
cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Nimble Caravel
cards.text:
First strike
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: North Ward Settler
cards.text:
When North Ward Settler enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Dwarf creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on North Ward Settler.

cards.flavor: No fallen being on Helicos goes to waste.
cards.name: Oaken Sentry
cards.text:
Reach
When Oaken Sentry enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Storms, krakens, plagues. Seen ‘em all. If you're scared, stay home.”
cards.name: Old Salt
cards.text: When Old Salt enters the battlefield, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Opaline Drake
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, up to one other target creature you control voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever a creature you control phases in, you may have it become a copy of target creature you control until end of turn.

cards.name: Orodu, the Onyx Wave
cards.text:
Trample
Orodu, the Onyx Wave can't block.
Whenever Orodu attacks, defending player may sacrifice a creature. If they do, prevent all combat damage Orodu would deal this turn.

cards.name: Osseous Augur
cards.text: When Osseous Augur enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If that creature's controller is cursed, that creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn instead.

cards.name: Pale Courier
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Pale Courier deals combat damage to a player, it voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Pale Courier phases in, create a 1/1 white Dwarf creature token.

cards.name: Pathless Shallows
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
When Pathless Shallows enters the battlefield, exile target creature enchanted player controls until Pathless Shallows leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted player can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

cards.name: Pay the Right Price
cards.text: Gain control of up to two target creatures or planeswalkers until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn. Pay the Right Price deals 3 damage to each of them at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Pelagic Hydra
cards.text:
Pelagic Hydra enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pelagic Hydra.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pelagic Hydra: It deals 1 damage to target creature blocking or blocked by it.

cards.name: Perennial Unrest
cards.text:
Madness {4}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Put a trample counter on it. If this spell's madness cost was paid, all creatures able to block that creature this turn do so.

cards.flavor: As they reasoned terms with the Sea Dogs, the Council of the Wards had no idea how many lives they were about to sign away.
cards.name: Perilous Treaty
cards.text: Target player discards two cards. Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor: As the plague ravaged the Wards with no sign of slowing down, tempers flared.
cards.name: Petty Dispute
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.flavor: “We can't promise health. We can't even promise life. But we promise we'll try.”
cards.name: Pick Up the Pieces
cards.text: Return X target creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then choose one of them and exile the rest.

cards.flavor: Giradrus's legion will pick your brain like a petty thief picks your pocket.
cards.name: Pilfer
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life unless that player is cursed.

cards.name: Pirate's Cutlass
cards.text:
When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Pirates never miss a golden opportunity.
cards.name: Pirate's Hideout
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

cards.name: Plucky Pickpocket
cards.text:
{T}: Plucky Pickpocket voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Plucky Pickpocket phases in, draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.flavor:
“Giradrus burned half our kind to the ground when he brought his treasure to Helicos. We will not be so unprepared for our next unwelcome visitor.”
—Gos, Knotweald Elder
cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

cards.name: Prowling Agamid
cards.text:
Trample
Resolute — {G}: Prowling Agamid gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn and only if Prowling Agamid's power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Pyre Apostle
cards.text:
Flying
When Pyre Apostle enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor:
With the grace of a pegasus
—Shiryen saying meaning
cards.name: Radiant Elegance
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.

cards.name: Rattled Bones
cards.text:
Menace
When Rattled Bones dies, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Raving Brigand
cards.text:
When Raving Brigand enters the battlefield, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Whenever you sacrifice an Omen, target player mills three cards.

cards.flavor: They left to chase glory, an unthinkable notion in their home village.
cards.name: Recruits of the Demeter
cards.text: When Recruits of the Demeter enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control another Pirate.

cards.flavor: Those fortunate enough to stay dead eventually give way to beauty.
cards.name: Revivification
cards.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 3 life.

cards.flavor:
“You broke countless laws, which is forgivable. But you also disrespected the pirate's code, and that I'm afraid we just can't alllow.”
—Loretta Wingate
cards.name: Revoke Privileges
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles.

cards.name: Rising Terrain
cards.text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Madness {1}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Roll the Dice
cards.text: Target opponent looks at the top six cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Choose a pile, then play any number of cards from it without paying their mana costs. Put the rest of the cards into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Bones and branches both break. But where men die, trees regrow.”
cards.name: Rootshaper
cards.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 4 minus that creature's power.

cards.flavor: Nothing stands in its way—at least, not for long.
cards.name: Ruinous Proselyte
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Ruinous Proselyte: Destroy target artifact or nonbasic land.

cards.flavor: He drinks until the horrors of the night meld with those in his head.
cards.name: Rum Guzzler
cards.text: When Rum Guzzler enters the battlefield, forebode, then you lose 1 life. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Run Through
cards.text:
Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
Madness {3}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: The crew of the Demeter follows a simple mantra: Go farther, get richer.
cards.name: Sail the Open Sea
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Tap target creature.
• Untap target creature and remove it from combat.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Yo ho ho, and a bottle of blood.”
cards.name: Salty Swab
cards.text:
When Salty Swab enters the battlefield, exile the top three cards of your library.
Resolute — You may play cards exiled with Salty Swab as long as Salty Swab's power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Salvage Wyvern
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: His mind was gone long before his flesh.
cards.name: Sanitarium Skeleton
cards.text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“The Wards see us as impulsive and chaotic. They don't understand that piracy is an art, requiring years of practice to perfect.”
—Atworth Wingate
cards.name: Scalawag Swagger
cards.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures get +2/+1 and have lifelink.

cards.name: Searle of the Tempest
cards.text:
First mate—Each nonland card in your starting deck targets or has an ability that targets. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Hexproof
Whenever a permanent you don't control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.

cards.name: Seasoned Lookout
cards.text:
Whenever Seasoned Lookout deals combat damage to a player, it voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Seasoned Lookout phases in, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Seawise Swain
cards.text:
Vigilance
Seawise Swain gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.
Seawise Swain gets +1/+1 as long as you control an enchantment.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Has been reworked. Originally "As long as it's your turn, Seto San is a 3/3 Human Warrior creature with lifelink and indestructible. [+1]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with lifelink. [-X]: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card with converted mana cost X and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. [-6]: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain double strike until end of turn."
cards.name: Seto San, the Dragonblade
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, Seto San is a 3/3 Human Warrior creature with indestructible.
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
[0]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
[-X]: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card with mana value X and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Shipwrecked
cards.text:
This spell has flash as long as an opponent is cursed.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Drakes on Helicos hunt those fleeing the island, starting with the sick and wounded.
cards.name: Shoal Raker
cards.text:
Flying
When Shoal Raker enters the battlefield, draw a card if an opponent is cursed.

cards.flavor: As the gargantuan beast flew off with his roof, Dogden vowed to never again be relieved that “it's just a bat.”
cards.name: Shrieking Nightwing
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Shrieking Nightwing gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Shrill Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, Shrill Griffin gains vigilance until end of turn if its power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Shrouded Spoils
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Shrouded Spoils enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

cards.name: Silent Hunt
cards.text:
Silent Hunt deals 3 damage to target creature and you gain 3 life.
Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“Any news on the Dauntless, Ashcroft?”
“I'm sorry, sir. Lost at sea.”
cards.name: Sink
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor: The phenomenon causing sailors to leap overboard to their deaths has been blamed on fictional beings, for lack of a real explanation.
cards.name: Siren's Song
cards.text: Draw a card, then forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“A thousand times we've sailed this seaway, undisturbed by the creatures within. Why have they now decided to attack?”
—Loretta Wingate
cards.name: Skerry Serpent
cards.text: Resolute — Skerry Serpent must be blocked if able as long as its power is greater than its base power.

cards.flavor:
“You begged my crew to take you to the captain. Well, here I am. What next?”
—Captain Raj of the Huntsman
cards.name: Skulduggery
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.

cards.name: Skysail Rigger
cards.text:
{1}{U}: Skysail Rigger voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Skysail Rigger phases in, put a flying counter on it.

cards.flavor: The world outside the walls is dangerous; best seen from above, Grigos reasoned.
cards.name: Skyward Gaveller
cards.text: Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Skyward Gaveller's power is greater than its base power, it gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Griffins help keep the peace with kind eyes and sharp claws.
cards.name: Skywise Emissary
cards.text:
Flying
As long as you control exactly one other creature, that creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

cards.name: Slaughterkeg
cards.text:
Slaughterkeg can't attack or block.
While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least Slaughterkeg if able.
When Slaughterkeg dies, draw a card.

cards.name: Sleepless Vigil
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever you attack enchanted player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is one plus the number of attacking creatures you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: At Giradrus's command, the city burned, and through the ashes strode emissaries of death.
cards.name: Smoldering Husk
cards.text:
When Smoldering Husk dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}{R}: Smoldering Husk gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As the dead rose, Jalro steadied his hand. There would be days in the future for remorse, but today was for courage.
cards.name: Solemn Cleaver
cards.text: First strike

cards.flavor: “Hear the music on the wind, boys? Let's sing along.”
cards.name: Song of the Sea
cards.text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)

cards.flavor: Its body extends and contracts at will to fit whatever ends up in its gullet.
cards.name: Staunch Constrictor
cards.text: {G}, Discard a card: Staunch Constrictor gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Strange Tides
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they mill two cards.
{U}, Sacrifice Strange Tides: Shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.

cards.flavor: With cursed gold on board, no corner of the three seas is safe.
cards.name: Stygian Leviathan
cards.text: When Stygian Leviathan enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Curses attached to them and you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: Roark grinned. Warm sun and clear skies. A perfect day for sailing!
cards.name: Sudden Storm
cards.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Now hits everyone on its controller's upkeep rather than their own upkeeps.
cards.flavor: “The sea sings my name. Mark my words, I will have her bounty.”
cards.name: Suitor of the Sea
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Suitor of the Sea deals 1 damage to each player.

cards.name: Sun-Crowned Flagship
cards.text:
{2}: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Sun-Crowned Flagship attacks, each attacking creature you control gains trample until end of turn.
Crew 7 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 7 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: “No other rig on the three seas will get you where you're going faster than the Winged Steed and my faithful crew.”
cards.name: Swift Corsair
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature or Vehicle you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Swooping Razorbeak
cards.text:
Flying
When Swooping Razorbeak enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Tabia of the Lionheart
cards.text:
First mate—Your starting deck contains no more than eight cards of each nonland card type. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
Lifelink
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 3 life. If you do, exile another target nonland permanent until Tabia leaves the battlefield. If you control another permanent that shares a card type with it, exile it instead.

cards.name: Tamiyo, Lunar Arcanist
cards.text:
[+1]: Scry 1. Untap up to one target creature.
[-2]: Mill a card for each card type among permanents you control, then you may return a land card and/or a nonland card milled this way to their owner's hand.
[-6]: Until end of turn, you may cast spells from your hand and graveyard without paying their mana costs. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: If there's one thing dwarves and humans agree on, it's a good drink.
cards.name: Tankard of Grog
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target nonartifact creature.

cards.flavor: “They came to our shores with swords already drawn, but even us trees have surprises of our own.”
cards.name: Tender Warden
cards.text: Discard a card: Tender Warden gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.

cards.name: Thalassophobia
cards.text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever enchanted player draws a card or casts a spell, put a foreshadow counter on Thalassophobia.
Remove eight foreshadow counters from Thalassophobia and sacrifice it: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token.

cards.name: The Winged Steed
cards.text:
Whenever The Winged Steed attacks, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: Only trees, as far as the eye can see.
cards.name: Thicket Mimicry
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “Welcome back, old friend! What news have you brought me about that curious land mass due south?”
cards.name: Three Seas Cartographer
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control phases in, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The promise of treasure is enough to turn most men to the sea.
cards.name: Three Seas Squire
cards.text: When Three Seas Squire enters the battlefield, target creature or Vehicle gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Shipwrecks hold secrets of the past, treasures of the present, and warnings for the future.
cards.name: Trawl the Wreckage
cards.text: For each permanent type, return up to one target card of that type from your graveyard to your hand. (The permanent types are artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker.)

cards.name: Treasure Hauler
cards.text:
Whenever Treasure Hauler attacks, draw a card.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Twilight Privateer
cards.text:
{1}{U}: Twilight Privateer voyages. (If it isn't blocking or targeted by another spell or ability, it phases out.)
Whenever Twilight Privateer phases in, up to one other target creature voyages.

cards.name: Two-Faced Marauder
cards.text:
Creatures you control dying cause abilities of that creature to trigger as though that creature entered the battlefield.
{2}{W}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Destroy target nonland permanent.

cards.name: Ulcerous Hellion
cards.text:
Haste
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.flavor: In a cloud of ashen shadow, it was gone just as quickly as it had come.
cards.name: Umbral Wolf
cards.text: Resolute — Umbral Wolf can't be blocked by more than one creature as long as Umbral Wolf's power is greater than its base power.

cards.flavor: The Lionheart emerged from the storm into the greatest discovery the Sea Dogs would ever make.
cards.name: Unknown Shores
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: “Lovely ship! Be a shame if someone blew a hole clean through her.”
cards.name: Unruly Cannoneer
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Unruly Cannoneer crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“I knew the day would come we were called to war, but I would have never guessed we'd be fighting the dead.”
—Remley Craggald of the East Ward
cards.name: Up in Arms
cards.text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.flavor: What's dead isn't always dead.
cards.name: Vagabones
cards.text: When Vagabones enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.

cards.name: Valencia of the Concordant

rulings.text: Valencia’s ability affects the total cost of the spell. It is applied after any other cost increasers or cost reducers are applied: First apply any cost increases. Next apply any cost reducers. Finally look at the amount of mana you have to pay. If it’s less than three mana, you’ll pay an extra {1}. If there are multiple effects of this type, the caster of the spell applies them in any order they choose.

cards.text:
First mate—There are four or fewer different mana costs among nonland cards in your starting deck. (If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)
First strike
Each spell your opponents cast that would cost less than three mana to cast costs {1} more to cast.

cards.flavor: Wishing to explore but confined by their roots, the trees brought the world to them.
cards.name: Verdurous Herald
cards.text: {4}{G}, Discard a card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland permanent card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
“The world beyond yours is a world of suffering. Unimaginable horrors, unspeakable secrets.”
—Lord Ellison Crain
cards.name: Visions of Oblivion
cards.text: You may cast up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.name: Vivid Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Resolute — At the beginning of combat on your turn, Vivid Griffin gains lifelink until end of turn if its power is greater than its base power.

cards.name: Wakeborne Kraken

rulings.text: If a creature would have normally gone to the graveyard, but that was replaced, eg ’If a creature would die, exile it instead,’ Wakeborne Kraken’s second ability will trigger.

cards.text:
Whenever Wakeborne Kraken or another Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls leaves the battlefield, if it didn't die, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Focus. The rocks ahead are perilous, but the storm behind is fatal.”
cards.name: Watchful Navigator
cards.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Watchful Navigator crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As the plague crept into the West Ward, those fortunate enough to stay healthy did everything they could to keep those less fortunate alive.
cards.name: West Ward Purifier
cards.text: Whenever West Ward Purifier becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
